questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the AssistHealth SOP training program?
questions.optionB: To provide standardized procedures for healthcare navigation

questions.question: Which of the following is a core value of AssistHealth?
What is the role of a Navigator in the healthcare system?
questions.optionB: Facilitating patient access to healthcare services

questions.question: Why is standardized documentation important?
questions.optionB: To ensure consistency and quality of care
